SELECT P.PIECE_NO, P.PIECE_TITLE, P.PIECE_DETAIL, P.PIECE_STATUS, P.SIZE_X, P.SIZE_Y, P.PIECE_CATEGORY_NO, P.PIECE_RENAME, PA.START_DATE, PA.START_PRICE, PA.HOPE_PRICE, PA.END_DATE, PC.PIECE_CATEGORY_NAME, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME FROM "PIECE" P JOIN "PIECE_AUCTION" PA ON P.PIECE_NO = PA.PIECE_NO JOIN "PIECE_CATEGORY" PC ON P.PIECE_CATEGORY_NO = PC.PIECE_CATEGORY_NO JOIN "ARTIST" A ON P.MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO WHERE P.PIECE_NO = #{pieceNo}
